details:
xen/netfront: destroy queues before real_num_tx_queues is zeroed

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.233 by commit 198cdc287769c717dafff5887c6125cb7a373bf3, it was introduced in version v4.19.226 by commit 35cad2003b6447932cfe91f795090586306738e8. For more details please see the references link.
summary: xen/netfront: destroy queues before real_num_tx_queues is zeroed
